metadata.Title: CVE-2020-27825 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
A use-after-free flaw was found in kernel/trace/ring_buffer.c in Linuxkernel (before 5.10-rc1). There was a race problem in trace_open and resizeof cpu buffer running parallely on different cpus, may cause a denial ofservice problem (DOS). This flaw could even allow a local attacker withspecial user privilege to a kernel information leak threat.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-27825` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:
